name: Cinnamon Sugar Almonds
description: A vegan treat of homemade cinnamon and sugar coated almonds, submitted by Madeline Heising, a student at Northeastern University, is a simple yet elegant twist of salty and sweet.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a saucepan over medium heat, and stir constantly until the water has evaporated and the nuts are covered in a totally dry coating, roughly 15 minutes. Transfer almonds to a plate lined with wax paper and allow to cool.
